Room.Name: Mountain Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking around the Nellan Mountain Range near the Ituk Glacier.
Room.LongDescription: The mountain trail leads through the mountains towards the Ituk Glacier, a massive piece of ice that seems to grow higher each year. The glacier is a potentially dangerous place in that it is very easy to get lost in such a massive wasteland. It would be wise to have a good ranger guiding your party.
